p: Fungi are controlled in stored grains with synthetic fungicides that in many cases have an unknown action mode with toxic effects on humans and animals, causing a negative effect on the environment [ 6]. It is desirable to search for harmless alternatives with minimal or no toxicity to humans. One option is the use of essential oils (EOs), which have been reported as an effective means to control fungal growth [ 7, 8, 9, 10, 11].
